creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
Fehler: this.ownerDocument.vdom.firstChild has no properties
Source File:
http://localhost:8080/lenyatrunk/default/modules/bxe/bxe/relaxng/NodeVAL.js

Firefox 2.0.0.9 (Mac OS X)
Lenya in non-root context

creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
The include statement in the RNG doesn't contain the context path:

<include href="/lenya/schemas/lenya.rng"/>

I guess it's a duplicate of bug 43750.
Works for me after the change in revision 595270.
creator: andreas@apache.org
